doc:
Caroline Ducey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caroline_Ducey 0 Caroline Ducey (born Caroline Trousselard, March 2, 1976 in Sainte-Adresse) is a French actress, who has appeared in 34 films since 1994. Outside of her home country, she is best known for her controversial role in Catherine Breillat's 1999 film Romance, a role for which she was awarded the 2000 Étoile d’or de la révélation féminine (Gold Star) by l’Académie de la presse du cinéma français. Ducey was nominated for the Prix Michel Simon film prize for Best Actress in Familles je vous hais (1997). In 2000, she was a member of the jury at the 22nd Moscow International Film Festival. Caroline_Ducey ( born Caroline_Trousselard , March_2_,_1976 in Sainte-Adresse ) is a_French_actress , who has_appeared in 34_films since 1994 . Ducey was_nominated for the_Prix_Michel_Simon_film_prize for Best_Actress in Familles_je vous_hais ( 1997_) . In 2000 , she was a_member of the_jury at the_22nd_Moscow_International_Film_Festival .
